multicall((address,bytes,uint256,bool,by.details: Locks the initiator so that the sender can be identified by other contracts.

params.bundle: The ordered array of calldata to execute.

initiator().notice: The initiator of the multicall transaction.

reenterHash().notice: Hash of the concatenation of the sender and the hash of the calldata of the next call to `reenter`.
